what: Finding Children with Unusual Growth Patterns
title: Finding Children with Unusual Growth Patterns
text: growthscreener package implements tools evaluate child growth respect Dutch criteria unusual growth. Application tools helps identify children meet criteria criteria referral youth health care (JGZ) follow-general physician paediatrician. current version implements Dutch guidelines height weight head circumference language development

title: Pick reference for evaluating weight guidelines — pick_reference_wgt
text: Z-score calculation relies normative references. exact reference used depends age child, sex, gestational age ethnicity. underweight guideline prescribes wgt references ages 0-1 years, wfh references ages 1-2 years. overweight guidelines prescribes wfh references ages 0-2 years. consistency simplicity, suggestion overweight guidelines followed - overweight. ages > 2.0,  international ethnic specific (HS) BMI-cut offs use. preterms (ga < 37) Dutch preterm wgt wfh references used. function return BMI references. Missing data policy: age sex missing, function returns NULL. ga missing, function assumes term birth. etn missing function assumes Dutch ethnicity.
